quote: Every storm runs out of rain.

When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
I will not lose, for even in defeat, thereâ€™s a valuable lesson learned, so it evens up for me.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.
A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people.
Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward. If you want to fly, you have to give up what weighs you down.
Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
Always find opportunities to make someone smile, and to offer random acts of kindness in everyday life.

Build Upon What Impresses You And Forget What Everyone Else Thinks.
There Is Always A Rainbow To Look Forward To.
Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality
